summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HMRC Red-Flag Detector application after bug fixes. All core functionality working correctly including data inconsistency validation, derived profit calculations, complete assessment flow, and API endpoints.
passed_tests: API Root Endpoint - Status 200 with correct response
Assessment Submission - Valid data processed correctly
Data Inconsistency Detection - Backend correctly flags loss checkbox with positive profit
Profit Calculation Edge Cases - Zero profit and negative profit handled correctly
Checkout Session Creation - Stripe integration functional
Admin Registration - New admin accounts can be created
Admin Stats - Dashboard data retrieval working
Frontend Data Inconsistency Validation - Warning appears, submit button disabled/enabled correctly
Derived Profit Field - Auto-calculation working, read-only, correct colors for positive/negative
Complete Assessment Flow - Form submission to results page working
Risk Score Display - Correct risk score and band badges displayed
Admin Portal Login Form - Form displays and registration option available

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (14/15 tests passed - 1 browser crash during admin portal full test)
